    • Method Detail

      • nextCandidateDocument

        public boolean nextCandidateDocument()
                              throws IOException
        Description copied from class: NodeScorer
        Advances to the next candidate document in the set, or returns false if there are no more docs in the set.

        A candidate document is a document that represents a potential match for the query. All the sub-scorers agree on its document id. However finding the matching node within this document still needs to be done. If the sub-scorers do not agree on a node by calling NodeScorer.nextNode(), the document must be considered as a non-matching document.

        This method is useful for optimisation, i.e., lazy loading and comparison of node information. It allows to iterate over documents and find candidate without loading node information. Node information are loaded and compared only when a candidate is found.

        Specified by:
        nextCandidateDocument in class NodeScorer
        Throws:
        IOException

      • nextNode

        public boolean nextNode()
                 throws IOException
        Description copied from class: NodeScorer
        Move to the next node path in the current document matching the query.

        Should not be called until NodeScorer.nextCandidateDocument() or NodeScorer.skipToCandidate(int) are called for the first time.

        Specified by:
        nextNode in class NodeScorer
        Returns:
        false if there is no more node for the current entity or if NodeScorer.nextCandidateDocument() or NodeScorer.skipToCandidate(int) were not called yet.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • doc

        public int doc()
        Description copied from class: NodeScorer
        Returns the following:
        • -1 or #NO_MORE_DOC if NodeScorer.nextCandidateDocument() or NodeScorer.skipToCandidate(int) were not called yet.
        • #NO_MORE_DOC if the iterator has exhausted.
        • Otherwise it should return the doc ID it is currently on.

        Specified by:
        doc in class NodeScorer

      • node

        public org.apache.lucene.util.IntsRef node()
        Description copied from class: NodeScorer
        Returns the following:
        • -1 or #NO_MORE_NOD if NodeScorer.nextNode() were not called yet.
        • #NO_MORE_NOD if the iterator has exhausted.
        • Otherwise it should return the node it is currently on.
        Specified by:
        node in class NodeScorer

      • skipToCandidate

        public boolean skipToCandidate(int target)
                        throws IOException
        Description copied from class: NodeScorer
        Skip to the first candidate document beyond (see NOTE below) the current whose number is greater than or equal to target. Returns false if there are no more docs in the set.

        NOTE: when target ≤ current implementations must not advance beyond their current NodeScorer.doc().

        Specified by:
        skipToCandidate in class NodeScorer
        Throws:
        IOException
